column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////You expect to wait a long time at a deep dish pizza spot
column2: but I'm not sure that this was worth it. The price was good
column3: but the pizza we got was pretty disappointing. Crust was almost break your teeth hard
column4: and the layers weren't really there. In one bite
column5: you would have just sausage and crust
column7: and every other permutation. I'm not sure if they were in a rush or just lazy
column8: but seeing all of the videos of malnatis preparing it looked like a perfect layering of the pizza. This was clearly not that.
